actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit discrimination by federally insured depository institutions in the making of mortgage loans on account of the geographical locations of real property upon which such loans are secured.

summary.text: Prohibits discrimination by federally insured depository institutions in the making of mortgage loans on account of the geographical location of real property upon which such loans are secured.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit discrimination by federally insured depository institutions in the making of mortgage loans on account of the geographical locations of real property upon which such loans are secured.
